description: Get detailed information about a particular Automation execution.

parameters.name: AutomationExecutionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for an existing automation execution to examine. The execution ID is returned by StartAutomationExecution when the execution of an Automation runbook is initiated.

nested_items.name: AutomationExecution
nested_items.description: Detailed information about the current state of an automation execution.

nested_items.name: AutomationExecutionId
nested_items.description: The execution ID.

nested_items.name: DocumentName
nested_items.description: The name of the Automation runbook used during the execution.

nested_items.name: DocumentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the document to use during execution.

nested_items.name: ExecutionStartTime
nested_items.description: The time the execution started.

nested_items.name: ExecutionEndTime
nested_items.description: The time the execution finished.

nested_items.name: AutomationExecutionStatus
nested_items.description: The execution status of the Automation.

nested_items.name: StepExecutions
nested_items.description: A list of details about the current state of all steps that comprise an execution. An Automation runbook contains a list of steps that are run in order.

nested_items.name: StepName
nested_items.description: The name of this execution step.

nested_items.name: Action
nested_items.description: The action this step performs. The action determines the behavior of the step.

nested_items.name: TimeoutSeconds
nested_items.description: The timeout seconds of the step.

nested_items.name: OnFailure
nested_items.description: The action to take if the step fails. The default value is Abort.

nested_items.name: MaxAttempts
nested_items.description: The maximum number of tries to run the action of the step. The default value is 1.

nested_items.name: ExecutionStartTime
nested_items.description: If a step has begun execution, this contains the time the step started. If the step is in Pending status, this field isn't populated.

nested_items.name: ExecutionEndTime
nested_items.description: If a step has finished execution, this contains the time the execution ended. If the step hasn't yet concluded, this field isn't populated.

nested_items.name: StepStatus
nested_items.description: The execution status for this step.

nested_items.name: ResponseCode
nested_items.description: The response code returned by the execution of the step.
(string) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Response
nested_items.description: A message associated with the response code for an execution.

nested_items.name: FailureMessage
nested_items.description: If a step failed, this message explains why the execution failed.

nested_items.name: FailureDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the Automation failure.

nested_items.name: FailureStage
nested_items.description: The stage of the Automation execution when the failure occurred. The stages include the following: InputValidation, PreVerification, Invocation, PostVerification.

nested_items.name: FailureType
nested_items.description: The type of Automation failure. Failure types include the following: Action, Permission, Throttling, Verification, Internal.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StepExecutionId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of a step execution.

nested_items.name: OverriddenParameters
nested_items.description: A user-specified list of parameters to override when running a step.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: IsEnd
nested_items.description: The flag which can be used to end automation no matter whether the step succeeds or fails.

nested_items.name: NextStep
nested_items.description: The next step after the step succeeds.

nested_items.name: IsCritical
nested_items.description: The flag which can be used to help decide whether the failure of current step leads to the Automation failure.

nested_items.name: ValidNextSteps
nested_items.description: Strategies used when step fails, we support Continue and Abort. Abort will fail the automation when the step fails. Continue will ignore the failure of current step and allow automation to run the next step. With conditional branching, we add step:stepName to support the automation to go to another specific step.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Targets
nested_items.description: The targets for the step execution.
Key=tag-key,Values=tag-value-1,tag-value-2

nested_items.name: TargetLocation
nested_items.description: The combination of Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts targeted by the current Automation execution.

nested_items.name: Accounts
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services accounts targeted by the current Automation execution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Regions
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Regions targeted by the current Automation execution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TargetLocationMaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The maximum number of Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts allowed to run the Automation concurrently.

nested_items.name: TargetLocationMaxErrors
nested_items.description: The maximum number of errors allowed before the system stops queueing additional Automation executions for the currently running Automation.

nested_items.name: ExecutionRoleName
nested_items.description: The Automation execution role used by the currently running Automation. If not specified, the default value is AWS-SystemsManager-AutomationExecutionRole.

nested_items.name: TargetLocationAlarmConfiguration
nested_items.description: The details for the CloudWatch alarm you want to apply to an automation or command.

nested_items.name: IgnorePollAlarmFailure
nested_items.description: When this value is true, your automation or command continues to run in cases where we can't retrieve alarm status information from CloudWatch. In cases where we successfully retrieve an alarm status of OK or INSUFFICIENT_DATA, the automation or command continues to run, regardless of this value. Default is false.

nested_items.name: Alarms
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch alarm specified in the configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: IncludeChildOrganizationUnits
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to include child organizational units (OUs) that are children of the targeted OUs. The default is false.

nested_items.name: ExcludeAccounts
nested_items.description: Amazon Web Services accounts or organizational units to exclude as expanded targets.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Targets
nested_items.description: A list of key-value mappings to target resources. If you specify values for this data type, you must also specify a value for TargetParameterName.
Key=tag-key,Values=tag-value-1,tag-value-2

nested_items.name: TargetsMaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The maximum number of targets allowed to run this task in parallel. This TargetsMaxConcurrency takes precedence over the StartAutomationExecution:MaxConcurrency parameter if both are supplied.

nested_items.name: TargetsMaxErrors
nested_items.description: The maximum number of errors that are allowed before the system stops running the automation on additional targets. This TargetsMaxErrors parameter takes precedence over the StartAutomationExecution:MaxErrors parameter if both are supplied.

nested_items.name: TriggeredAlarms
nested_items.description: The CloudWatch alarms that were invoked by the automation.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: ParentStepDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the parent step.

nested_items.name: StepExecutionId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of a step execution.

nested_items.name: StepName
nested_items.description: The name of the step.

nested_items.name: Action
nested_items.description: The name of the automation action.

nested_items.name: Iteration
nested_items.description: The current repetition of the loop represented by an integer.

nested_items.name: IteratorValue
nested_items.description: The current value of the specified iterator in the loop.

nested_items.name: StepExecutionsTruncated
nested_items.description: A boolean value that indicates if the response contains the full list of the Automation step executions. If true, use the DescribeAutomationStepExecutions API operation to get the full list of step executions.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The key-value map of execution parameters, which were supplied when calling  StartAutomationExecution.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FailureMessage
nested_items.description: A message describing why an execution has failed, if the status is set to Failed.

nested_items.name: Mode
nested_items.description: The automation execution mode.

nested_items.name: ParentAutomationExecutionId
nested_items.description: The AutomationExecutionId of the parent automation.

nested_items.name: ExecutedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who ran the automation.

nested_items.name: CurrentStepName
nested_items.description: The name of the step that is currently running.

nested_items.name: CurrentAction
nested_items.description: The action of the step that is currently running.

nested_items.name: TargetParameterName
nested_items.description: The parameter name.

nested_items.name: Targets
nested_items.description: The specified targets.
Key=tag-key,Values=tag-value-1,tag-value-2

nested_items.name: TargetMaps
nested_items.description: The specified key-value mapping of document parameters to target resources.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ResolvedTargets
nested_items.description: A list of resolved targets in the rate control execution.

nested_items.name: ParameterValues
nested_items.description: A list of parameter values sent to targets that resolved during the Automation execution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Truncated
nested_items.description: A boolean value indicating whether the resolved target list is truncated.

nested_items.name: MaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The MaxConcurrency value specified by the user when the execution started.

nested_items.name: MaxErrors
nested_items.description: The MaxErrors value specified by the user when the execution started.

nested_items.name: Target
nested_items.description: The target of the execution.

nested_items.name: TargetLocations
nested_items.description: The combination of Amazon Web Services Regions and/or Amazon Web Services accounts where you want to run the Automation.

nested_items.name: Accounts
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services accounts targeted by the current Automation execution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Regions
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Regions targeted by the current Automation execution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TargetLocationMaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The maximum number of Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts allowed to run the Automation concurrently.

nested_items.name: TargetLocationMaxErrors
nested_items.description: The maximum number of errors allowed before the system stops queueing additional Automation executions for the currently running Automation.

nested_items.name: ExecutionRoleName
nested_items.description: The Automation execution role used by the currently running Automation. If not specified, the default value is AWS-SystemsManager-AutomationExecutionRole.

nested_items.name: TargetLocationAlarmConfiguration
nested_items.description: The details for the CloudWatch alarm you want to apply to an automation or command.

nested_items.name: IgnorePollAlarmFailure
nested_items.description: When this value is true, your automation or command continues to run in cases where we can't retrieve alarm status information from CloudWatch. In cases where we successfully retrieve an alarm status of OK or INSUFFICIENT_DATA, the automation or command continues to run, regardless of this value. Default is false.

nested_items.name: Alarms
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch alarm specified in the configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: IncludeChildOrganizationUnits
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to include child organizational units (OUs) that are children of the targeted OUs. The default is false.

nested_items.name: ExcludeAccounts
nested_items.description: Amazon Web Services accounts or organizational units to exclude as expanded targets.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Targets
nested_items.description: A list of key-value mappings to target resources. If you specify values for this data type, you must also specify a value for TargetParameterName.
Key=tag-key,Values=tag-value-1,tag-value-2

nested_items.name: TargetsMaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The maximum number of targets allowed to run this task in parallel. This TargetsMaxConcurrency takes precedence over the StartAutomationExecution:MaxConcurrency parameter if both are supplied.

nested_items.name: TargetsMaxErrors
nested_items.description: The maximum number of errors that are allowed before the system stops running the automation on additional targets. This TargetsMaxErrors parameter takes precedence over the StartAutomationExecution:MaxErrors parameter if both are supplied.

nested_items.name: ProgressCounters
nested_items.description: An aggregate of step execution statuses displayed in the Amazon Web Services Systems Manager console for a multi-Region and multi-account Automation execution.

nested_items.name: TotalSteps
nested_items.description: The total number of steps run in all specified Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts for the current Automation execution.

nested_items.name: SuccessSteps
nested_items.description: The total number of steps that successfully completed in all specified Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts for the current Automation execution.

nested_items.name: FailedSteps
nested_items.description: The total number of steps that failed to run in all specified Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts for the current Automation execution.

nested_items.name: CancelledSteps
nested_items.description: The total number of steps that the system cancelled in all specified Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts for the current Automation execution.

nested_items.name: TimedOutSteps
nested_items.description: The total number of steps that timed out in all specified Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts for the current Automation execution.

nested_items.name: AlarmConfiguration
nested_items.description: The details for the CloudWatch alarm applied to your automation.

nested_items.name: IgnorePollAlarmFailure
nested_items.description: When this value is true, your automation or command continues to run in cases where we can't retrieve alarm status information from CloudWatch. In cases where we successfully retrieve an alarm status of OK or INSUFFICIENT_DATA, the automation or command continues to run, regardless of this value. Default is false.

nested_items.name: Alarms
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch alarm specified in the configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: TriggeredAlarms
nested_items.description: The CloudWatch alarm that was invoked by the automation.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: TargetLocationsURL
nested_items.description: A publicly accessible URL for a file that contains the TargetLocations body. Currently, only files in presigned Amazon S3 buckets are supported.

nested_items.name: AutomationSubtype
nested_items.description: The subtype of the Automation operation. Currently, the only supported value is ChangeRequest.

nested_items.name: ScheduledTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the Automation operation is scheduled to start.

nested_items.name: Runbooks
nested_items.description: Information about the Automation runbooks that are run as part of a runbook workflow.

nested_items.name: DocumentName
nested_items.description: The name of the Automation runbook used in a runbook workflow.

nested_items.name: DocumentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the Automation runbook used in a runbook workflow.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The key-value map of execution parameters, which were supplied when calling StartChangeRequestExecution.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TargetParameterName
nested_items.description: The name of the parameter used as the target resource for the rate-controlled runbook workflow. Required if you specify Targets.

nested_items.name: Targets
nested_items.description: A key-value mapping to target resources that the runbook operation performs tasks on. Required if you specify TargetParameterName.
Key=tag-key,Values=tag-value-1,tag-value-2

nested_items.name: TargetMaps
nested_items.description: A key-value mapping of runbook parameters to target resources. Both Targets and TargetMaps can't be specified together.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The MaxConcurrency value specified by the user when the operation started, indicating the maximum number of resources that the runbook operation can run on at the same time.

nested_items.name: MaxErrors
nested_items.description: The MaxErrors value specified by the user when the execution started, indicating the maximum number of errors that can occur during the operation before the updates are stopped or rolled back.

nested_items.name: TargetLocations
nested_items.description: Information about the Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts targeted by the current Runbook operation.

nested_items.name: Accounts
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services accounts targeted by the current Automation execution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Regions
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Regions targeted by the current Automation execution.
(string) ---

nested_items.description: The maximum number of Amazon Web Services Regions and Amazon Web Services accounts allowed to run the Automation concurrently.

nested_items.description: The maximum number of errors allowed before the system stops queueing additional Automation executions for the currently running Automation.

nested_items.name: ExecutionRoleName
nested_items.description: The Automation execution role used by the currently running Automation. If not specified, the default value is AWS-SystemsManager-AutomationExecutionRole.

nested_items.name: TargetLocationAlarmConfiguration
nested_items.description: The details for the CloudWatch alarm you want to apply to an automation or command.

In cases where we successfully retrieve an alarm status of OK or INSUFFICIENT_DATA, the automation or command continues to run, regardless of this value. Default is false.

nested_items.name: OpsItemId
nested_items.description: The ID of an OpsItem that is created to represent a Change Manager change request.

nested_items.name: AssociationId
